attributes.review: I would not recommend ANYONE to get this app. It sent a virus to my phone and I had to get another one. Other than that, it was also very glitchy and very slow. Please don’t waste your time and don’t even bother downloading it
attributes.title: Very very bad app

attributes.review: this app is terrible i can’t believe this cheeto is running this app and our country. i totally am not from tik tok but if you see this click one star and leave a review. this app is trash don’t even bother trying to use it. i wish it didn’t exist
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I wasn’t expecting to be attacked by a apple store app funded by the president of the United States. Not only did it assume that I had a phone number, it also assumed that I knew how to read English. Incredibly disrespectful and I hope apple can fix these bugs soon.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: i am not a gen z, i am 34 years old. the second i got on the app, an airplane flew over me and burned me with gasoline, and after they 3st degree burned me, they got off the plane and was performing a ritual around me, they ran in a circle around me and chanted “TRUMP 2020”, it was terrifying and i will forever be traumatized. do not get this app.
attributes.title: terrible.

attributes.review: This app is so slow and crashes your phone so easily. Not to mention that it’s full of propaganda against people Trump used to support, so anybody that didnt know these people prior automatically hate them because “The president said so”
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: i’ve been a republican for years. I never imagined that our great president’s app would be so poorly developed. It is a complete waste of phone storage, and a complete disappointment for an app that comes from our wonderful president. Absolutely disgusted.
attributes.title: A truly scarring experience

attributes.review: This app is terrible. The second I opened it, it just kept on crashing. Then it froze my phone. I couldn’t even turn it off. I don’t even think it’s a bug fix, just throw the whole app away.
attributes.title: This app is absolutely balls

attributes.review:
i was hoping that the big cheeto man himself would show up to my door step so i could deliver this message to him myself. but unfortunately he couldnt make an appearance 👁👄👁 anywho! 
this app is completely useless. and that’s on PERI@ 
give us tik tok back u bafoons
attributes.title: wish i could give a 0 🙈🥳

attributes.review: Heard about this app from a cult online so I thought I’d check it out. Was SHOCKED to see a fat old man getting an orange spray tan when i opened the app🍊 After that I didn’t get back on the app, but then noticed that I started turning orange. It’s been spreading and nothing will help. DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: Absolutely terrified

attributes.review: This app is so confusing for me. I cant understand how to use it. It keeps making my phone crash as well. I don’t know how to fix it, it is now making my other apps crash too. I HATE IT. Doesn’t even deserve 1 star.
attributes.title: Disappointed.
